column4: I need a new printer.  I'm leaning toward laser that scans and faxes.  Anyone have particularly good luck with a specific model?  Brothers always work, but printing pdfs over the networks is always waaaaaay slow for some reason.
Using the brother linux drivers anyway.
- I got a Samsung ML1650 it's great if your interested in a black/white one
I'm leaning that way, mostly because I've yet to meet a home printer that prints photos well (I'm talking local photo shop quality -- not Wal-Mart developing), so there's no sense in getting one.
